00013 #include <hypar.h>

00027 int ApplyBoundaryConditions(void    *s,     
00028                             void    *m,     
00029                             double  *x,     
00030                             double  *xref,  
00031                             int     flag,   
00032                             double  waqt    
00033                            ) 
00034 {
00035   HyPar           *solver   = (HyPar*)          s;
00036   DomainBoundary  *boundary = (DomainBoundary*) solver->boundary;
00037   MPIVariables    *mpi      = (MPIVariables*)   m;
00038   int             nb        = solver->nBoundaryZones;
00039   _DECLARE_IERR_;
00040 
00041   /* Apply domain boundary conditions to x */
00042   int n;
00043   if (flag) {
00044     for (n = 0; n < nb; n++) {
00045       IERR boundary[n].BCFunctionDU(&boundary[n],mpi,solver->ndims,solver->nvars,
00046                                    solver->dim_local,solver->ghosts,x,xref,waqt);
00047       CHECKERR(ierr);
00048     }
00049   } else {
00050     for (n = 0; n < nb; n++) {
00051       IERR boundary[n].BCFunctionU(&boundary[n],mpi,solver->ndims,solver->nvars,
00052                                    solver->dim_local,solver->ghosts,x,waqt);
00053       CHECKERR(ierr);
00054     }
00055   }
00056 
00057   return(0);
00058 }
